text: @erinyesbutno I think she can still do real good in her position while maintaining the profile of 'only as left as Capital allows'. We both need and need to allow for those figures in modern media, an empty space is another fashy talking point.

@erinyesbutno My personal take, I think she does care about it but thing is, with shit actually like... Getting real real over the next few years... I can't blame her for being more conservative in what she says. It's one thing warning about Nazi's when they're in the background and need1/2

@erinyesbutno (And to be clear- I do like contra. She's not perfect but she absolutely gets major shit thrown at her that just doesn't apply. I have some significant disagreements with some of her points but overall we align on the important stuff.

@HarpoonLobotomy For me I really enjoy Contra’s content, but her last few videos have made me realize she was probably never real anything close to a Marxist and probably doesn’t have any strong political views beyond popular leftist talking points

@erinyesbutno @canonicallythey @ThisIsLesboMaya @muke10101 I completely agree, I'm extremely critical of any of those claims. I believe it holds up here but as I've said (a few times) above, I'm perfectly open to my take being wrong, actively looking for holes in my arguments/opinions tbh.
@HarpoonLobotomy @canonicallythey @ThisIsLesboMaya @muke10101 Assuming every bad analysis is actually through some layer of irony or something is an easy trap to fall into
@canonicallythey @ThisIsLesboMaya @muke10101 ... the tone of the entire clip isn't an indication to you?
@ThisIsLesboMaya @muke10101 there's some jokes sprinkled in there but there is no indication that the entire opinion is a joke
@muke10101 this was a fucking joke lul wtf
